nodes.text: A stripper was a type of dancer that specialized in sexual enticement before a crowd of, usually, beings of the opposite gender. During a dance routine, the stripper would take off his or her outer garments in a stylistic fashion, revealing either their nude or semi-nude forms or revealing underwear.
During his time on Dathomir, Prince Isolder imagined the many Dathomiri witches of Singing Mountain Clan staring at him with lust, as though he were a stripper.
